resources.string: Failed to load your note. Check your password and try again.
Save your note to apply your new password.
Unless you close this application, your secure note may be available in the background.
The text you enter here will be stored securely
Are you sure you wish to delete your secure note and reset your password?
Deleted your note and reset your password
Failed to delete your note and reset your passwod
Your secure note has not been saved. Are you sure you wish to close and discard your changes?
In order to store a secure note, your device must first be made secure. Enable device administration to use this application.
By disabling this option, your secure note will be deleted. Are you sure you wish to continue?
